name: Misfits - Two Sides of the Moon
name_original: Misfits - Two Sides of the Moon
description:
(Warning! Misfits is a game for adults. You must be +18! )


Misfits - Two Sides of the Moon is a gay romance visual novel. The action takes place in the territory of two kingdoms that are divided. Rikkai, vampire and alchemist, finds a werewolf in the woods. Despite his fear and the law, he decides to help and take care of him, and gain his trust so that Silvestre gives him his blood for research. 

Throughout the game, you will be able to learn more about the world and characters from Rikkai's perspective. And also learn more about him. 

The decisions you make won't only affect the ending, but also how you see the world. Think carefully what decisions you will make. Even those seemingly unimportant. 

Author of story and art is me, Silvia Wild. You can find me on my own twitter

The text was translated into English by TheRosalie.

And the proofreading was done by Rey

If you want to keep up to date with vn, don't forget to follow Misfits twitter

If you want to help develop the game by donating money to Patreon, click THERE!

Also, check out Furry Paradise and Visual Novels novel server here! This server has a lot of helpful people and a nice atmosphere. If you create vn, they'll be happy to help you, or if you're looking for a job, such as creating sprites for vn, you can find people to hire you! I hope you will enjoy on this server ^^
